summary: A small cave that was a player\'s home, now left abandoned.
descriptionHtml:
A small cave that was a player\'s home, now left abandoned.
I created this cave in my name, that others can see what I enjoy doing in Skyrim and loot my valuables.

I will be adding a Tamrielic Ingredients version of this mod, which will use some of the ingredients from that mod as well as default as I enjoy both equally.

Any information regarding where it is, refer to the images.
I\'ve included my ring that I enchanted, nothing OP.

Some may find the amount of ingredients a bit heavy, same with the soul gems. I hoard ingredients and soul gems everywhere I go. I drop my weapons and armour just to keep them. So I think it portrays me alright.

Videos:
onlyDistort made a short YouTube review here;
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hL0q6jA5Omc

Any criticism would be taken well, thank you.
author: InFerNos1
